snippet.title: HITMAN 3 - Nintendo Switch Announcement
snippet.description:
We’re excited to announce that HITMAN 3 will be coming to Nintendo Switch, playable via cloud streaming technology. 

Our Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer includes previously unseen footage from HITMAN 3. Visit http://www.hitman.com
